name: .SPI File Extension
summary: Learn about .SPI files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can use the Explore Backup Wizard included in StorageCraft ShadowProtect (Windows) to mount the backup disk image an SPI file contains. Remember that, to use an SPI file as a backup disk image, you will need access to the SPI file's corresponding SPF file, as well as any additional SPI files created in the time between your SPI and SPF file's creation. For more information, refer to StorageCraft's official support documentation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
